page.title: 02WILDLIFE PART TWO
page.content: {HOW WE FELT IN THE FOREST It was wet and damp in the forest and all I could here was the sound of birds,twigs snaping and slight movement behind the trees. We felt the midges in our faces and hair. We kept having to scratch ourselfs .We found plucked feathers lying in a group and cone that have been half eaten. Some of the trees were swaying because it looked like things were up in the trees. We found paw prints that looked quite big. We thought they were foxes paw prints. It looked liked everything was watching us. Quite a lot of small feathers were lying on the ground next to the path. The ground was covered with gnawed wood and roots. We walked down to the small stream to see if there was any fish.
